name: MoviPlex
description: A fully responsive Angular web app for booking movie reservations. Uses Angular Material UI for clean and modern design with a focus on component-based architecture.

name: Fridgorithm
description: An AI-powered recipe generator for Azure AI Hackathon. Built with Express.js backend and React frontend. Features voice, image, and text input, and integrates OpenAI with Azure Custom Vision for ingredient detection.

name: BRoast
description: A Gen Z-style resume roaster built with Flask and Angular for BearHacks. Integrates OpenAI and Perplexity APIs to provide humorous and helpful resume feedback. Includes backend auth and frontend integration.

name: CustomerManager
description: A simple customer management CRUD app using Spring Boot & Thymeleaf. Responsively designed using media queries for mobile and desktop.

name: BrainBuddy
description: An AI web app with an integrated chatbot that generates personalized flashcards, answers questions, and simplifies learning concepts for users based on the user's selected topic and grad level. A full stack project using Flask & React.

name: My Portfolio
description: My first start-to-finish, completely independently planned & executed project outside of school. This project used the Express.js framework, and GitHub and Vercel for deployment.

name: Number Guesser Game
description: A CodeCademy template project demonstrating JavaScript documentation, DOM methods, and event handling; deployed as a static webpage using an AWS S3 bucket.
